name: Simple Checkers & Chess
description:
The story is that you are stuck inside a game of intense checkers/chess with yourself or with a friend/foe.  You must win the game of chess/checkers with the normal or made up rules respectively to get out.  

Theme is casino vacation paradise.

Goal in checkers is to eliminate all opposing pieces.

Goal in chess is to mate (checkmate) the enemy king or stalemate if you count that as a victory.

Hover over piece, click, drag and drop piece where it should go based on normal/modified rules.  Remove (take pieces off of the game board) when pieces have been taken by the enemy player. 

Red/Black Rectangle space is designated for removed pieces to keep track of (net score) but not needed for gameplay.  100% preference.
